meta.@content: Jeep with mountain background. Click to animate.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

-children.#comment: Some parts for the body of the Jeep were borrowed from Savage and modified by the author
The suspensions and the wheels were borrowed from Savage and modified by the author
The windscreen was borrowed from Savage and was modified by the author

TouchSensor.@description: activates the movement of the seat
activates the movement of the seat

-children.#comment: The steering wheel was borrowed fron Savage and modified by the author
The following sensors describe the turn of the steering wheel and the front wheels
the following sensors describe the movement of the Jeep and the wheels

TouchSensor.@description: activates the movement of the Jeep

-children.#comment: The following background was taken from the VRML2.0 Sourcebook
